Detailed Description

Main class.

This class is used to generate recursive tree and later to fill in mesh and billboard information. It is the heart of the whole system.

Definition at line 43 of file CTStem.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CaduneTree::Stem::Stem ( Parameters *  params,
Stem *  parent = 0 
)

Constructor sets parameters to their default values.

Parameters:
params - pointer to Parameters object, according to which tree will be generated.
parent - should be null, because normal user will start new tree, which has no parent branch

Member Function Documentation

void CaduneTree::Stem::grow ( const Ogre::Quaternion &  orientation,
const Ogre::Vector3 &  origin,
float  radius = 1.0f,
float  length = 1.0f,
float  offset = 0.0f,
unsigned char  level = 0 
)

Grows tree - generates tree structure

Parameters:
orientation - initial orientation
origin - initial position
radius - default to 1.0, for level 0 it has no effect
length - default to 1.0, for level 0 it has no effect
offset - default to 0.0, for level 0 it has no effect
level - default to 0, should be kept this way, other values are used internally

void CaduneTree::Stem::createGeometry ( Ogre::ManualObject *  geom  ) 

Creates mesh from previously generated data using grow(...)

Parameters:
geom - pointer to ManualObject, which is for now used for generating mesh

void CaduneTree::Stem::createLeaves ( Ogre::BillboardSet *  set  ) 

Creates billboard leaves from previously generate data

Parameters:
set - pointer to BillboardSet, which will hold every leaf.
